name: gruha-platform
description: GRUHA - Climate Resilience Infrastructure for MSMEs with Real Blockchain

scripts.contracts:deploy:local: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network localhost
scripts.contracts:deploy:mumbai: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network mumbai
scripts.contracts:deploy:amoy: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.ts --network amoy
scripts.services:dev: concurrently --names "GATEWAY,USER,WALLET,BOOKING,BLOCKCHAIN" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run user:dev" "npm run wallet:dev" "npm run booking:dev" "npm run blockchain:dev"
scripts.start:all: concurrently --names "GATEWAY,USER,WALLET,BOOKING,BLOCKCHAIN,WEB" -c "cyan,green,yellow,magenta,blue,white" "npm run gateway:dev" "npm run user:dev" "npm run wallet:dev" "npm run booking:dev" "npm run blockchain:dev" "npm run web:dev"
